articles.author: Alex Cranz
articles.title: Killing Eve’s final season rights itself and makes Eve the star again - The Verge
articles.description: BBC America made the first three episodes of the final season of Killing Eve available to critics and its as exciting and witty as previous seasons, but with the added bonus of giving Sandra Oh some actual plot lines.
articles.content: Killing Eve, a show about a stylish assassin hunted by a frumpy MI6 agent, made it easy to fall a little in love with a serial killer. Vibrant clothes, a bumping soundtrack, and a coy smile from Vill… [+4455 chars]

articles.author: The Editorial Board
articles.title: Energy, Russia and American Power - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Biden’s war on fossil fuels helps Putin, as the Ukraine crisis shows.
articles.content: Russias invasion of Ukraine is a 3 a.m. wake-up call to President Biden and Americas liberal political class: Cease your war on U.S. energy. Europes climate obsessions have rendered it vulnerable to … [+406 chars]
